Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Minnesota in 1974...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1975, off Andres Echeverria (NE)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1975, off Hubert Herman (TOL)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1975...
Injured on 4/17/1976 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Third Base in 1976...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/30/1977 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1979, hitting .449 with 2 HR, 12 RBI...
Won World Championship with Minnesota in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1980, hitting .522 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/14/1981, hitting .560 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1981, hitting .526 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Boston (FBA) on 6/19/1983...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/22/1985...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1986, hitting .374 with 6 HR, 19 RBI...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 5/13/1986...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 6/21/1987, off Tyler George (WT)...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/25/1987, hitting .556 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Penn on 10/10/1988...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1989, hitting .480 with 0 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1989, hitting .425 with 7 HR, 19 RBI...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1990, hitting .571 with 1 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Had 3000th career hit on 6/4/1992, off Dante Ruvalcaba (PEN)...
Drove in 6 runs against Lynchburg on 7/22/1992...
Injured on 8/21/1992 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
